views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9 and 10

SleekSheets allows for Action Sheets to be modified to allow a more 'flat' style.

SleekSheets lets your actions sheets:
- Be completely flush
- Be edge-to-edge
- Hide the cancel button
- Hide the separators

Configure options from Settinngs.

-Compatible with iOS 11 - Updated to correctly work on both iOS 10 and iOS 9. (Previously; 2.0.0 was only iOS 10, 1.0.0 was only iOS 9) - Support for iOS 10
- 'Square Corners' was changed to 'Completely flush'
- Fixed donation link not working as expected
- Updated depiction
